data.name: Adventure Fitness VR
data.detailed_description:
Adventure Fitness VR plays a bit like a VR triathlon or CrossFit workout with a mix of high and low intensity workout sections along each specified course.

It is one part climbing game, with a diverse set of obstacles such as climbing ropes, monkey bars, cliff ledges, and more.





Then it is one part running game (featuring arm swing controls for running) as you move from obstacle to obstacle and move yourself throughout the course.





Then finally you will encounter high intensity fitness challenges along the way, designed to really challenge you on activities ranging from boxing to archery to battle ropes and more.





Think of it as doing high intensity interval training but in a VR game!

We invite you to come try it and see what time you can set for your personal best across several different levels.





Coming Soon In 2022 For PC VR.


Development Roadmap
New Features Planned:

  • High intensity VR workout sections featuring archery, boxing, and battle ropes
  • Local/Online Leaderboards
  • Procedurally Generated Levels for a fresh challenge every day
  • Multiplayer Support

New Content:

  • Four more worlds planned inspired by landscapes in Norway, Italy, Malibu California, and one more undecided.
  • Back-story narrative & main hub world
  • "Decapitator" obstacles forcing you to duck

Backstory

Adventure Fitness Ltd is a near-future company with an AI gone wrong.
In a post-AI world where humans no longer had to work, the vision of the company was to solve two critical issues plaguing humanity: obesity and boredom.
These AI started looking at a variety of ways to inspire humans to do fitness, but in the end their neural networks settled on a dangerous solution.
They invited human participants and transported them to exotic locations with incredibly challenging obstacle sets with high rises and even higher stakes: their life!
You are one of these participants.
Exercise, thrive, survive!

data.short_description: Challenge yourself on this VR fitness game! Run, climb, and zipline through a diverse set of environment using arm swing controls and then get through high intensity workout stations ranging from battle ropes, archery, boxing, and more. It's a bit like running a VR triathlon.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core Sky Lake Intel CPU or AMD Ryzen 5 2nd Gen.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
